holidays.title: National Paper Airplane Day
holidays.description: Paper airplanes have fascinated children and adults alike around the globe for generations.

holidays.title: Buddha Day
holidays.description: Discover the history of Buddha Day and how it is celebrated around the world.

holidays.title: Carb Day
holidays.description: This is the day for racing enthusiasts! It’s Carb Day and we are raring to go.

holidays.title: European Neighbors' Day
holidays.description: Invite over your neighbors to a nice meal and get to know your community!

holidays.title: Georgia Independence Day
holidays.description: Celebrating the rise of the nation of Georgia and its claim to victorious independence.

holidays.title: Independence Day (Guyana)
holidays.description: Celebrate Guyana’s Independence Day and the rich cultural heritage of the Guyanese people.

holidays.title: National Blueberry Cheesecake Day
holidays.description: This day is dedicated to the blueberry cheesecake, one of the most popular desserts in the U.S.

holidays.title: National Cherry Dessert Day
holidays.description: Cherry pies, cherry tarts, and cherry biscuits are some of the few reasons we love today!

holidays.title: National Cooler Day
holidays.description: Grab your cooler filled with ice and drinks, and let’s head out this National Cooler Day.

holidays.title: National Death Busters Day
holidays.description: Let’s remind ourselves and our loved ones to buckle up, be cautious, and drive safely.

holidays.title: National Don’t Fry Day
holidays.description: You wouldn’t let your child smoke, why let them fry? National Don’t Fry Day is here!

holidays.title: National Heat Awareness Day
holidays.description: This health holiday cannot get any hotter — keep it cool on National Heat Awareness Day.

holidays.title: National Road Trip Day
holidays.description: Think you know all about the ‘Great American Road Trip’? We’ll see about that!

holidays.title: National Sorry Day
holidays.description: National Sorry Day commemorates the mistreatment of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people.

holidays.title: National Title Track Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to find out how title tracks evolved over the years and how to celebrate.

holidays.title: Sally Ride Day
holidays.description: Sally Ride Day is a fun holiday that honors the first American woman in space.

holidays.title: World Dracula Day
holidays.description: This World Dracula Day, celebrate Stoker’s literary work and its big impact on pop culture.

holidays.title: World Lindy Hop Day
holidays.description: A dancing style that has endured time by bringing people together and helping spread joy.

holidays.title: World Red Head Day
holidays.description: Let your hair down and celebrate its uniqueness on World Redhead Day.

holidays.title: Jace’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper and songwriter is quickly making a name for himself; he is one to remember.

holidays.title: John Wayne’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor and filmmaker was a shining star in Hollywood’s Golden Age.

holidays.title: Lenny Kravitz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is impossible to achieve for this extremely committed, multi-talented singer and actor.

holidays.title: Nicole Tv’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this YouTube and social media sensation, nothing will stand in her way to greatness.

holidays.title: Scott Disick’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limitations to what the celebrated reality star, Scott Disick, can do.

holidays.title: Stevie Nicks’s Birthday
holidays.description: This tremendously talented rock artist has always been a real eager beaver.
